metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1000038 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
In MuPDF 1.12.0 and earlier, a stack buffer overflow in functionpdf_lookup_cmap_full in pdf/pdf-cmap.c could allow an attacker to executearbitrary code via a crafted file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1000038` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mupdf - 1.13.0+ds1-1
mupdf-tools - 1.13.0+ds1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mupdf package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.13.0+ds1-1').
